summary: Client requested Sarah set up a vision meeting; PM asked for a project name. Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide comments.

actions.task: Schedule a vision meeting, propose agenda, and invite stakeholders; collect proposed project names from PM and team beforehand

backlog_deltas.title: Create backlog item to organize vision meeting and define project name/goals

risks.risk: Lack of a defined project vision/name may cause scope ambiguity and delays.
risks.mitigation: Hold the vision meeting promptly; PM to propose a project name and preliminary goals before the meeting; document outcomes and update backlog items.
